mdRecord.dcterms:title: City of Clifton Forge Fire Mobilization Plan Memorandum, February 12, 1941
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memo written on February 12, 1941 about creating a fire mobilization plan now that L.A. Ballard is on the committee for this plan and F.H. Wheeler, the writer of the memo, is the chairman of this committee.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
